name: Expansion of 1/(1 - x*(1 + x)^3)^3.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,6,-8,-33,-24,39,108,123,84,36,9,1).
program: (Magma) R<x> := PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), 40); f := 1/(1 - x*(1 + x)^3)^3; seq := [ Coefficient(f, n) : n in [0..30] ]; seq; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 02 2025
author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 31 2025

name: Square array T(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals downwards, where column k is the expansion of 1/(1 - x*(1+x)^k)^k.
formula: T(n,k) = Sum_{j=0..n} (-1)^j * binomial(-k,j) * binomial(k*j,n-j) = Sum_{j=0..n} binomial(j+k-1,j) * binomial(k*j,n-j).
program: (PARI) T(n, k) = sum(j=0, n, binomial(j+k-1, j)*binomial(k*j, n-j));
author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 08 2023

name: Expansion of 1/(1 - x*(1 + x)^3)^2.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,5,0,-13,-20,-15,-6,-1).
program: (Magma) R<x> := PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), 40); f := 1/(1 - x - 3*x^2 - 3*x^3 - x^4)^2; seq := [ Coefficient(f, n) : n in [0..30] ]; seq; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 08 2025
author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 31 2025

name: Expansion of 1/(1 - x*(1 + x)^2)^3.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,3,-8,-12,3,17,15,6,1).
program: (Magma) R<x> := PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), 40); f := 1/(1 - x*(1 + x)^2)^3; seq := [ Coefficient(f, n) : n in [0..30] ]; seq; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 10 2025
author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 31 2025

name: G.f. A(x) satisfies A(x) = 1/( 1 - x * (1+x)^3 * A(x) )^3.
formula: If g.f. satisfies A(x) = ( 1 + x*A(x)^(t/r) * (1 + x*A(x)^(u/r))^s )^r, then a(n) = r * Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(t*k+u*(n-k)+r,k) * binomial(s*k,n-k)/(t*k+u*(n-k)+r).
G.f.: B(x)^3, where B(x) is the g.f. of A366272.
program: (PARI) a(n, r=3, s=3, t=4, u=0) = r*sum(k=0, n, binomial(t*k+u*(n-k)+r, k)*binomial(s*k, n-k)/(t*k+u*(n-k)+r));
author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 08 2025
